game.name: Mountain Mini Car Racer
game.description:
Get ready to drive the best arcade car on the road in this cool brand new racing challenge! Only those who are good at driving can participate here. Would you like to try out your luck, friends? If yes, join Mountain Mini Car Racer and be prepared to play against the time or fight with bots. We know that it requires a lot of concentration and intensive driving abilities. But, your nice command over car racing will help get through all the obstacles on the different deadly tracks.

Play solo mode or choose the multi-mode as per your requirements and wishes! Use the R, D, F, G keys to control your vehicle on the tracks that are tricky and a bit scary at some points! Put your fingers on the assigned keys and get race the craziest course! We are damn sure that you would fall in love with the terrains of this HTML5 car game! Be careful as each terrain features unique curves, jumps as well as other elements!

Good luck to go against the clock, beat your opponents and win the championship like never before! Start your racing fun by selecting your level out of easy, average or difficult) and see yourself winning some cool tracks like a champion! Our website is full of free online driving games that are playable on different latest browsers and devices. So once you get connected with us, you are guaranteed to have the biggest fun of your life.
